name: Bug Bill VR
description:
This is a VR game only tested on Oculus Quest 2 and was made in less than 30 days for the 2021 Game Off game jam. The theme of this game jam is "BUG".  In order to play this game you will need to use the Oculus Developer Hub application (free) in order to install this game to your Oculus. Made by a team of 2 people. This is our first game jam and also our first game that we've ever uploaded anywhere.

    Try to bug your friend Beetle Bill who lives across the street in any way possible. He's asleep and you just want him to wake up so that you can hang out.

GitHub: github.com/GameJay/BugBillVR
